testcase.name: To verify that user is able to login into Application with valid creds
testcase.system-out: Given I open the login page URL.............................................passed When I enter the username in username field.................................passed And I enter the password in password name field.............................passed And I click Login button....................................................passed Then I should be navigated to home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: To verify that user should not able to login into Application with invalid creds
testcase.system-out: Given I open the login page URL.............................................passed When I enter the username in username field.................................passed And I enter the password in password name field.............................passed And I click Login button....................................................passed Then I should be able see error message.....................................passed
